description: This file defines CSS styles for a frontend application, including theme management with CSS variables, styles for various elements like the app container, header, links, and buttons, as well as responsive design considerations.

classes.name: App
classes.description: Styles applied to the main application container, including alignment, background color, and text color.

classes.name: App-logo
classes.description: Styles for the App logo, including size and pointer events.

classes.name: App-header
classes.description: Styles for the header of the application, including layout, background color, and font size.

classes.name: App-link
classes.description: Styles for links in the application, including color and hover transition effects.

classes.name: theme-toggle
classes.description: Styles for the theme toggle button, including position, background color, hover effects, and responsive adjustments.
